org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks

类 SystemProcessingTimeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks.ProcessingTimeService
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.runtime.tasks.SystemProcessingTimeService

  • public class SystemProcessingTimeService
extends ProcessingTimeService
    A ProcessingTimeService which assigns as current processing time the result of calling System.currentTimeMillis() and registers timers using a ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  SystemProcessingTimeService.NeverCompleteFuture 
      private static class  SystemProcessingTimeService.RepeatedTriggerTask
      Internal task which is repeatedly called by the processing time service.
      private static class  SystemProcessingTimeService.TriggerTask
      Internal task that is invoked by the timer service and triggers the target.

      The containing task that owns this time service provider.

      • getCurrentProcessingTime

        public long getCurrentProcessingTime()
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        Returns the current processing time.
        指定者:
        getCurrentProcessingTime 在类中 ProcessingTimeService

      • registerTimer

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> registerTimer(long timestamp,
                                                             ProcessingTimeCallback target)
        Registers a task to be executed no sooner than time timestamp, but without strong guarantees of order.
        指定者:
        registerTimer 在类中 ProcessingTimeService
        参数:
        timestamp - Time when the task is to be enabled (in processing time)
        target - The task to be executed
        返回:
        The future that represents the scheduled task. This always returns some future, even if the timer was shut down

      • scheduleAtFixedRate

        public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(ProcessingTimeCallback callback,
                                                                   long initialDelay,
                                                                   long period)
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        Registers a task to be executed repeatedly at a fixed rate.
        指定者:
        scheduleAtFixedRate 在类中 ProcessingTimeService
        参数:
        callback - to be executed after the initial delay and then after each period
        initialDelay - initial delay to start executing callback
        period - after the initial delay after which the callback is executed
        返回:
        Scheduled future representing the task to be executed repeatedly

      • isAlive

        @VisibleForTesting
boolean isAlive()
        返回:
        true is the status of the service is STATUS_ALIVE, false otherwise.

      • isTerminated

        public boolean isTerminated()
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        Returns true if the service has been shut down, false otherwise.
        指定者:
        isTerminated 在类中 ProcessingTimeService

      • quiesce

        public void quiesce()
             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        This method puts the service into a state where it does not register new timers, but returns for each call to ProcessingTimeService.registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) only a "mock" future. Furthermore, the method clears all not yet started timers.

        This method can be used to cleanly shut down the timer service. The using components will not notice that the service is shut down (as for example via exceptions when registering a new timer), but the service will simply not fire any timer any more.

        指定者:
        quiesce 在类中 ProcessingTimeService
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • awaitPendingAfterQuiesce

        public void awaitPendingAfterQuiesce()
                              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        This method can be used after calling ProcessingTimeService.quiesce(), and awaits the completion of currently executing timers.
        指定者:
        awaitPendingAfterQuiesce 在类中 ProcessingTimeService
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • shutdownService

        public void shutdownService()
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        Shuts down and clean up the timer service provider hard and immediately. This does not wait for any timer to complete. Any further call to ProcessingTimeService.registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will result in a hard exception.
        指定者:
        shutdownService 在类中 ProcessingTimeService

      • shutdownAndAwaitPending

        public boolean shutdownAndAwaitPending(long time,
                                       java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit timeUnit)
                                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        从类复制的说明: ProcessingTimeService
        Shuts down and clean up the timer service provider hard and immediately. This does wait for all timers to complete or until the time limit is exceeded. Any call to ProcessingTimeService.registerTimer(long, ProcessingTimeCallback) will result in a hard exception after calling this method.
        指定者:
        shutdownAndAwaitPending 在类中 ProcessingTimeService
        参数:
        time - time to wait for termination.
        timeUnit - time unit of parameter time.
        返回:
        true if this timer service and all pending timers are terminated and false if the timeout elapsed before this happened.
        抛出:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws java.lang.Throwable

        finalize 在类中 java.lang.Object
